programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1939
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep363
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Legend of the Naga Pearls
programme.desc: A thief and a constable team up to save humanity from creatures known as the Winged Tribe, who lost their power of flight centuries ago after their war against mankind. They are hell-bent on seeking revenge by obtaining a mystical artifact called the Naga Pearls.

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy
programme.desc: To teach his irresponsible daughter Jennifer some respect, her billionaire father pretends to disown her. He then hires Mario to pretend to be her driver and protect her. Just as the two start falling for each other, Jennifer’s father becomes very ill and she must take over his business. Will Jennifer and Mario’s budding romance continue?

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following “The Way We Are”, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: A high school student gets pregnant and is forced to have an abortion. When she dies from the operation, she returns as a ghost to haunt the apartment complex that she used to live

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: Let me Eat Your Pancreas
programme.desc: A student called “I” finds the diary of his classmate, Sakura Yamauchi, and discovers that she has a pancreatic disease. The two begin to spend more time together, but Sakura eventually pass away from her illness. But Sakura had a hidden message she wanted to convey, will “I” uncover it 12 years after her death?

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return…

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Love on a Diet
programme.desc: Mini's broken heart leads her to pack on the pounds. She meets an obese man named Fatso who helps her get back on track and shed the pounds. After dropping the unwanted heft, Mini rekindles her relationship with her first love, but is this the happy ending that she wants?

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: The Bravest Escort Group
programme.desc: A band of courageous bodyguards is tasked with escorting the daughter of general, the concubine of the recently deceased Ming emperor Wu Sangui, and her son, who is the last hope of the Ming Dynasty, to safety.

programme.title: Cross
programme.desc: Lee believes people who commit suicide will go to hell. After his wife killed herself because of cancer, Lee feels the pain of people with suicidal thoughts and thinks of killing them to bring them to heaven. He then kills the four people from a suicidal website. Despite Lee seeing himself acting upon God’s will, his belief is being challenged.

programme.title: Shining Moment
programme.desc: After being sidelined by the gymnastics team, Yu quits and reinvents himself as a Latin dance instructor. Starting afresh, he begins to assemble a group of children to compete in the Latin dance competition. But can Yu, still facing his own insecurities, bring out the best in these children and let them shine on stage?

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man’s wife, mistress, love child and his grandma for a huge ransom. Little did they expect that the heartless tycoon has hired an assassin to take them out instead of paying the ransom.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: The Golden Monk
programme.desc: A monk realizes he is the reincarnation of Golden Child who was cast down from heaven to experience life and death a hundred times, as he broke a sacred rule by falling in love with a fairy, Jade. While his memories are erased, Jade refuses to forget their love and accumulates goodwill over a hundred reincarnations to end Golden Child’s suffering.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of “The Way We Dance” features the plight of Hong Kong’s grassroots performing artists as they fight against the government’s plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: Buddha'S Palm
programme.desc: In the arsenal of classic martial arts secret weapons, there is none more lethal than the Buddha's Palm, a technique by which an ordinary hand is transformed into a formidable force. Ku, a blind recluse living in a cave, knows its secret, which proves to be as much a blessing as a curse as it attracts all manner of mayhem...

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents’ kung fu styles.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat’s knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit…

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu’s beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: Commissioner Liu Ta-hua (Tsao Ta-hua) is arrested by special envoy Cheng Chih-cheng (Wang Jung) for corruption. Coolie Lin Szu-hai (Gordon Liu Chia-hui), who has unintentionally helped Cheng, is given a small post under Lo. Lin is smart and soon learns how to get dockside bribes. Later, he gets a regular spin-off from Adjutant Chang…

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple’s brothel.

programme.title: Ten Tigers Of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan…

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu’s enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past 10 years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: The "godfather of the kung-fu film," Chang Cheh, started a winning streak by making the internationally renowned THE FIVE VENOMS. He followed that hit with many more high-flying "bloody good" entertainments featuring the same cast in new roles. But of all the "Venom" movies, this one stands out as perhaps the most chilling. Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: Melody Of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s “a-go-go” era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father’s death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the “Toad Stance” and accidentally unveils his true identity…

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai struggles with The Blue forces of freedom, love, the sea and the sky, and The Black, the bottomless pit of evil. Lin’s poignant performance is memorable, however, it is that of newcomer Angela Yu Chien, who was named Best Supporting Actress. Part I ends with a literal cliffhanger, setting the stage for the equally memorable Part II.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: This is the sequel to The Mad Monk, which was made in 1977 by director Li Han-hsiang and starring Yeh Feng. Striking again alongside The Mad Monk (Yeh Feng) is equally legendary Lu Tung-pin (Hua Lun), the immortal scholar-turned-genie. The duo wreck havoc as they vie with one another be it mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Judgement Of An Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue…

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his father’s death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness. One day, he meets and befriends a kind hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui’s embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love…

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Kid With The Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister’s wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his “Crazy Lo Han Fist” improves with every fight.

programme.title: Thondan
programme.desc: Narayanan, a politician's son, assaults Vishnu when his brother dies in his ambulance. Later, he makes Vishnu's life miserable by bribing the local police officers and government officials.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Jeeva, Sathish, Venkat and Sadhik join hands in order to rob a bank with a chimpanzee as their accomplice. However, things do not go the way they planned.

programme.title: Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee
programme.desc: A group of teenagers studying in a strict Catholic school in the 1990s learn how to navigate through the challenges of school life and adolescence.

programme.title: Kuttram 23
programme.desc: ACP Vetrimaaran unravels a crime racket involving medical professionals. However, his task becomes harder every day as the case becomes murkier and complex.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: The home minister requests Ravi to impersonate the deceased ACP Baldev, his lookalike, to catch Ganguly, a dreaded gangster. After taking over his new role, Ravi finds many startling revelations.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: A girl who has lost her parents is facing the issue of pursuing an independent life or raising her younger brother.

programme.title: Kadaan
programme.desc: Kaadan, a man born and raised in a forest, decides to protect the jungle and the wildlife within after he realises that a greedy politician is planning to destroy it and build a township.

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Chennai Palani Mars
programme.desc: An aspiring scientist and a musician, who are cocaine-addicts, attempt to travel to Mars with the help of a scientifically unstable concept.

programme.title: Bhagimathie
programme.desc: Chanchala, an IAS officer, is imprisoned in a haunted house for interrogation. However, things take an unexpected turn when she gets possessed by a spirit

programme.title: Ivan Kavalkaran
programme.desc: Ivan Kavalkaran is the story of Vijay (Bellamkonda Srinivas) a sincere and dynamic police officer who gets stuck in a kidnap case which turns his life upside down as the entire department and society turns against him. He has 24 hours to prove his innocence and get back to his respectable life. Will he be able to do that?

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali From Nadukkaveri embraces the Power and the Importance of Education for Women. Born as a Girl Child in a village called Nadukkaveri, How Kamali becomes the identity of the same village is what this film is all about.

programme.title: Ko2
programme.desc: When Kumaran, an ordinary citizen, abducts the chief minister of the state of Tamil Nadu, the whole nation wonders what could have compelled a seemingly innocent man to adopt such a drastic step.

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: A TV journalist goes against the orders of his corrupt and dishonest boss and helps a group of youngsters in their fight against a pesticide factory.

programme.title: Akashaganga 2
programme.desc: Arathi, an atheist, doesn't believe in evil spirits. However, when she tries to communicate with her mother's soul as part of a challenge, an evil spirit, which unfolds the dark secrets of Arathi's family, is awakened.`x

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Upon being released from prison, Sachi demands to lead a tranquil life with his family. However, fate has other plans for the ex-convict when he encounters a dangerous drug lord.

programme.title: Mannar Vageyara
programme.desc: Madhi helps his brother Arivu unite with the love of his life, which causes trouble between the families. When Madhi tells his parents about the woman he loves, they disapprove of his relationship.

programme.title: Sethupathy
programme.desc: Sethupathi, a tough police officer, investigates the murder of an inspector. His findings lead to the arrest of Vathiyar, an influential man in Madurai, but put his life, career and family at risk.

programme.title: Billa Pandi
programme.desc: Billa, a kind-hearted construction contractor, is in love with his aunt's daughter, Valli. However, problems arise when another woman, whose house he built, develops feelings for him.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Ignoring her misgivings, a young woman purchases a vintage car, which seems to have a mind of its own. Further investigation reveals that it is possessed by a vengeful spirit with ties to her past.

programme.title: Saaho
programme.desc: An undercover agent and his partner go after a thief who has stolen 2,000 crore rupees. Soon, they realise that the case is linked to the death of a crime lord and an emerging gang war.

programme.title: Dhuruvangal 16
programme.desc: A couple dies under mysterious circumstances and Inspector Deepak is assigned the case. However, he loses his leg in a confrontation during the investigation, which leads to the end of his career.

programme.title: Vellaikara Durai
programme.desc: Murugan falls in love with Yamuna and with the help of his friend Paandi,he saves Yamuna from a marriage with a notorious money lender.

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.desc: Going Coastal - SerpentZA and Laowhy86 begin their epic adventure, starting in former German concession, Qingdao. They taste a wriggly local speciality; explore hidden war tunnels and head to a sleepy seaside village.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep2
programme.desc: Skirting The Border - SerpentZA and Laowhy86 travel across Liaoning and Jilin Provinces. They explore one of China’s most famous ghost cities; tread carefully around the North Korean border and learn about a traditional North Korean alcohol.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep3
programme.desc: The Grasslands - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 stop off in the capital of Heilongjiang province, Harbin. From there, they venture into the vast grasslands of Inner Mongolia, herding camels and building their very own Mongolian yurt.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep4
programme.desc: China’s Northernmost Point - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 learn how Mongolians cook goats in their own skins, get serenaded by locals on the China/Russian border, and finally complete their journey at China’s northernmost point.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 Ep10
programme.desc: Demon Teen / Dark Shadows / Paranormal Plaza - A father calls 911 about his daughter’s weird behavior. Officer Scott is called to an attempted robbery, and finds an elderly man being tormented. The Police receive a call that there is a bomb left in a mall.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 Ep11
programme.desc: Whispers In The Dark / Board At Work - Security Guard John Griffin is called to an emergency alarm in a hospital building where he encounters unexplained phenomena. Firefighter Jake Parsons unknowingly summons a spirit via Ouija board.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 Ep12
programme.desc: Portal Peril / Full Moon Fever - Officer Joe responds to a 911 call about strange activity taking place in a residential home. Firefighter/EMT Ting Rappa responds to two alarms at the same amusement park.

programme.desc: Dangerously Fast - A military veteran, a college soccer player, and a dancer are just 3 of the competitors in the Tag Arena. Bodies are pushed to their limits as they battle the pro-Taggers. And there’s just one rule: Don’t.Get.Caught!

programme.title: Born To Be Wild Ep1
programme.desc: South America - Born To Be Wild

programme.title: Born To Be Wild Ep2
programme.desc: Africa - Born To Be Wild

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep1
programme.desc: Going Coastal - SerpentZA and Laowhy86 begin their epic adventure, starting in former German concession, Qingdao. They taste a wriggly local speciality; explore hidden war tunnels and head to a sleepy seaside village.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep2
programme.desc: Skirting The Border - SerpentZA and Laowhy86 travel across Liaoning and Jilin Provinces. They explore one of China’s most famous ghost cities; tread carefully around the North Korean border and learn about a traditional North Korean alcohol.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep3
programme.desc: The Grasslands - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 stop off in the capital of Heilongjiang province, Harbin. From there, they venture into the vast grasslands of Inner Mongolia, herding camels and building their very own Mongolian yurt.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep4
programme.desc: China’s Northernmost Point - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 learn how Mongolians cook goats in their own skins, get serenaded by locals on the China/Russian border, and finally complete their journey at China’s northernmost point.

programme.title: Wisecrack Ep13
programme.desc: WiseCrack Quick Take - Wisecrack explores big ideas like philosophy and critical thinking through the lens of movies, TV shows, video games, current events, books, and more.

programme.title: Wisecrack Ep1
programme.desc: 8 Bit Philosophy: Philosophy And Politics - Wisecrack explores big ideas like philosophy and critical thinking through the lens of movies, TV shows, video games, current events, books, and more.

programme.title: Wisecrack Ep2
programme.desc: 8 Bit Philosophy: Philosophy And People - Wisecrack explores big ideas like philosophy and critical thinking through the lens of movies, TV shows, video games, current events, books, and more.

programme.title: Wisecrack Ep3
programme.desc: 8 Bit Philosophy: Philosophy And Pop Culture - Wisecrack explores big ideas like philosophy and critical thinking through the lens of movies, TV shows, video games, current events, books, and more.

programme.title: My Paranormal Nightmare Ep4
programme.desc: Shadow Dwellers - In this episode spirits are no longer satisfied dwelling in the dark, and once they move out of obscurity, they delight in tormenting the living.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S7 Ep8
programme.desc: Iceland - Ben journeys to the freezing coastal waters of Iceland to live with Hakon, a former carpenter who overcame alcohol and embraced a clean, solo life in the wilderness on an private island.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Frozen Planet returns with a spellbinding journey through magical icy lands. Worlds of surprising variety and beauty - seemingly untouched by human presence, it's this isolation that makes these places so special.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Trans-Siberian Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley embarks on a 6,400-mile journey along the Trans-Siberian railway. Joanna visits a Chairman Mao-themed restaurant and is awestruck by the Forbidden City in Beijing.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Asia - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Asia and the rarely-observed inhabitants that roam the mountains, deserts and jungles.

programme.title: The Earthshot Prize: Repairing Our Planet S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Protect and Restore Nature - Prince William, founder of the Earthshot Prize, is joined by Sir David Attenborough, a member of his Earthshot Prize Council, to explore how we may best protect and restore nature. Sir David explains exactly what aspect of our approach to modern life is causing a global decline in biodiversity, and how damaging this decline will be to our own lives. But, he reveals, we know how to halt and reverse the loss of wildlife.

programme.desc: Coral Reefs - Corals build themselves homes of limestone in the seas of the tropics. They are complex structures where there is fierce rivalry for space, but the reef is also a place full of opportunity.

programme.desc: The Delta - Sue visits the beautiful mangroves of the Sundarbans, home of the Bengal tiger, and meets the villagers who live in fear of an attack. She discovers a world defined by water and the devastating impact of climate change.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep7
programme.desc: In this episode, tortilla chips are produced by the thousand, bite-size coffee cakes are created, and vegan mint double chocolate cookies are made. Plus, a look at microwaveable popcorn.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep8
programme.desc: This episode looks at the production of Triple "C" cheesecake, animal crackers, crispy sweet potato fries, and the tofu that gets a gourmet overhaul.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep3
programme.desc: South America - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of South America - the most species-rich continent on Earth.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Trans-Siberian Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Mongolia, Joanna spends time with native nomads and visits a gold mine. She also heads to the nation's capital, Ulan Bator, to meet the famous Mongolian throat-singers.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Discover how engineers built Zaha Hadid's Antwerp Port House, find out how 432 Park Avenue New York was built and marvel at Kengo Kuma's Victoria & Albert Museum in Dundee, Scotland.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Alaska - Robson heads north to Alaska for extreme temperatures and extreme fish, including northern pike, king salmon, cod, chinook salmon and rainbow trout.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque Ep5
programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - The Woodland Troop Ep1
programme.desc: In this small patch of woodland, two young monkeys face the toughest time of their lives. As they find their place in the world, they must learn which neighbors are allies, and which are foes. Who to trust, and who to avoid. They will suffer loss, and gain friends, as they discover what it means to be part of the Woodland Troop.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Better Together Ep2
programme.desc: The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Safari CSI Ep3
programme.desc: Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Africa's Edens Ep4
programme.desc: Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool, wet Kasanka National Park. Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Horses of St. Pierre & Miquelon Ep10
programme.desc: In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies. Wild Wild East infiltrates the herd to explore the politics and power of horses. Meanwhile, in the waters surrounding the French archipelago, the once-vast stocks of cod fish are disappearing, changing life above the surface for humans and horses.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Lady Elliot Island Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chico the Baby Capuchin Ep4
programme.desc: In Brazil’s Serra da Capivara, Chico, the baby capuchin monkey is learning to integrate into a troop with complicated rules, and exploring a forest full of excitement and danger. But mastering the art of tool use holds the key to his survival.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque Ep5
programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - The Woodland Troop Ep1

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Safari CSI Ep3

Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Christmas Island Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Invasion Ep11
programme.desc: Non-native species have made their way into the Wild Wild East and staked their claim to the jagged coast. At White Point Beach Resort in Liverpool, Nova Scotia bunnies have hopped on in for an extended holiday. It’s turf wars between the beachcombers and the chalets dwellers. Meanwhile, the starling population is beginning to rival gulls and pigeons.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chico the Baby Capuchin Ep4
programme.desc: In Brazil’s Serra da Capivara, Chico, the baby capuchin monkey is learning to integrate into a troop with complicated rules, and exploring a forest full of excitement and danger. But mastering the art of tool use holds the key to his survival.

Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Enjoy the spring baby boom at the center as the staff go gaga over an adorable bundle of baby possums. Then see the rescue team hit a rooftop patio for a little R and R: retrieving and rescuing a mama and her ducklings perched high above the city.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 2 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the center’s release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things don’t go exactly as planned.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Rheas-Cerrado Ep8
programme.desc: Every year in the dry season, as the floodwaters disappear, the grasslands of the Pantanal are home to many species: giant anteaters, maned wolves and the greater rheas- the largest bird in South America.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Heidelberg Ep1
programme.desc: Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - The Domino Effect Ep1
programme.desc: Witness some big changes when four cute new arrivals join the nursery classes. And for a handful of adolescent males that are growing too big and boisterous for their babysitters, it’s their last day at forest school.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque Ep5
programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it’s wildlife.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - The Domino Effect Ep1
programme.desc: Witness some big changes when four cute new arrivals join the nursery classes. And for a handful of adolescent males that are growing too big and boisterous for their babysitters, it’s their last day at forest school.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque Ep5
programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists’ cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweed—all following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Join the search for a Cooper’s hawk who’s taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centre’s skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals’ stinky natural defences.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 4 Ep4
programme.desc: When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when they’re done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote who’s enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Giant Otter Refuge Ep9
programme.desc: At the southern edge of the Pantanal, in one of the world’s largest tropical wetlands, Biologist Carolina Ribas and her local guide, Arilei Terena search for a giant otter den. Despite their large size, noisy and gregarious nature, endangered giant otters are notoriously shy and hard to find.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Carcassonne Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Dilla’s Surprise Ep2
programme.desc: Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - The Woodland Troop Ep1
programme.desc: In this small patch of woodland, two young monkeys face the toughest time of their lives. As they find their place in the world, they must learn which neighbors are allies, and which are foes. Who to trust, and who to avoid. They will suffer loss, and gain friends, as they discover what it means to be part of the Woodland Troop.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 - The Borderlands Ep1
programme.desc: Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. The predator/prey relationship is a delicate balance, and the perfect place to see it in action is the Kootenay area of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 - In the Peaks Ep2
programme.desc: The air is thin and cold, trees can’t even live here -­‐ it’s not exactly a welcoming place to live. But animals like mountain goats and bighorn sheep and even black bears manage to skitter around these peaks with ease. We’ll take a look at how these creatures manage to defy gravity, among some of the highest peaks on the continent.

programme.desc: Rupert & The Missing Music - Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to make their band instruments play better but the spell goes wrong. The colourful musical notes fly away, leaving them with instruments that make no sound.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Rupert And The Weather Machine - When it starts raining sausages in Nutwood Rupert and friends fly up to the Cloud Shepherd's home to find out what has happened to the weather machine.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep25
programme.desc: Holiday Hijinx - There's no such thing as the perfect, simple gift for the members of the Pod 4. The kids over-think and over-plan their holiday gift giving until they've driven themselves — and each other — a little crazy.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep26
programme.desc: Rope Burn - When distracted spotter Birch turns away for a minute, Sandra falls and ends up twisting her ankle. Feeling immensely guilty, Birch offers her assistance, which Sandra promptly begins to take advantage. Suspecting she's being exploited, Birch sets Sandra up for a “big fall” in front of the whole school at a poetry slam.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep77
programme.desc: Fifi'S Busy Day - Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep78
programme.desc: Dingaling Poppy - Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Postcards From The Veg - Pieface laments that Paul is looking peaky and needs a holiday. Dennis has a plan! But its only when Walter kidnaps Paul that he realises his chips are down and he needs to get the gangs help to put things right!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Whole Tooth - Gnasher gnashes Walters portrait so he retaliates with a titanium sausage leaving Gnasher toothless, miserable and without his mojo! Dennis and the gang will have to stage a heist to 'borrow' some diamonds until Gnasher's teeth grow back!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep13
programme.desc: The Black Paladin - Voltron charges toward Zarkon's massive ship. When Shiro loses control of the Black Lion, the team must figure out a new way to defeat the Galra.

programme.desc: Return Of The Guapos Part 3 - After the Guapos steal their show, Peabody and Sherman must track down 3 historical bandits running amuck in NYC.

programme.desc: Magnet Mountain - Revvithelps Ty unlock his ultimate power to rescue all their friends trapped inside a magnetized mountain by D-Structs, Splitter, Blayde and Pounde

programme.desc: Ty And Revvit - Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.desc: Chicken At Sea / The Key Master - Archibald hits the high seas to help out endangered turtles. It's Archibald to the rescue when the citizens of Crackridge report a series of thefts.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Frenzied Farts Of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter The Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep1
programme.desc: Booving In / Sant Oh - Best friends Tip and Oh drive each other crazy when he moves into the human world with her./Oh stirs up trouble when he tries to act like Santa Claus.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep27
programme.desc: Why Ostrich Sticks Her Head In The Ground - You see there was a time when Ostrich was all covered in feathers and unlike all the other birds, Ostrich wasn't very good at flying at all. One night in Tinga Tinga Spider decided to make Jackal a pair of wings so that he could fly up to the moon and stop howling! Jackal and Spider stole the feathers from Ostrich's neck and legs until she looked like a very big plucked chicken! The next day Ostrich was mortified and stuck her head in the ground so that Lion couldn't see her. And it was perfect … because Ostrich looked just like a bush! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep28
programme.desc: Why Camel Has A Hump - You see there was time when Camel didn't have a hump. He lived very far away in the hot desert. But one day the desert got too hot… even for Camel. So he started walking. When Camel arrived at the Waterhole he asked the animals if he good have a drink. All the animals weren't pleased at all because the rains hadn't come and they were very thirsty. Lion allowed Camel to have one drink… but ONE drink, and ONE DRINK ONLY! Camel slurped, and he slurped, and he slurped! Until ‘POP!' a big, wobbly hump appeared on his back full of all the animals' water! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep27
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Race - Noddy is suspicious when Revs suddenly slows down during a race on the roller coaster in DareDale. He doesn't like to lose and doesn't understand what's happened. Noddy needs to investigate so that they don't lose another race! Using all his investigate skills Noddy follows the clues to the Farm where he finds out that Revs deliberately slowed down so his friend Tractor wouldn't come last as usual. Noddy realises what a great friend Revs is to Tractor. He suggests that they have another race for fun and not just to win. This time EVERYONE has fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep28
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Xylophone Bridge - Everyone is enjoying playing games on Toy Green but when Noddy and Big Ears come back from apple picking at the farm they discover someone, or something, has broken a key on the xylophone bridge. Noddy needs to investigate! With the help of Bumpy and Revs and using the wwwbook to gather clues, Noddy discovers that someone has tried to fix it with purple sticky tape. If he can find out who uses purple sticky tape he might discover who broke the key. The trail leads him to Smartysaurus, who broke the bridge by mistake when she was playing bowling. Noddy and Deltoid show the big dinosaur how to play the game without breaking anything else. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep27
programme.desc: What Do We Need To Grow Beans? - Jess and the friends want to grow something for their kind friend Mimi who's always growing special things for them. They start with a bean and work out how important sunlight and water are too, by trial and error.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep28
programme.desc: Why Is Hedgehog Curled Up? - Jess is very worried about Hedgehog. He keeps curling up into a ball and Jess thinks he must need help and wants to find out how he can make his little friend feel better. Jess thinks he may need help building a little house, or that he's cold or needs a drink. But it's only when his farmyard buddies who are busy playing 'Scarey Steps' come and shout 'Scarey!' that Jess realises little HH curles up when he's frightened. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see if they can spot a hedgehog out and about, but of course, remember to be gentle.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Frenzied Farts Of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep1
programme.desc: The Perfect Show/ Napoleon - Peabody & Sherman's first show goes off the rails when celebrity-seeking neighbors won't leave; Napoleon throws a temper tantrum to get his own dessert.

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep1
programme.desc: Becoming Part 1 - An average high school student, Jim Lake, yearns for adventure and he gets more than he bargained for when he inherits the mantle of Trollhunter after the previous Trollhunter is killed

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep1
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter The Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep1
programme.desc: Wednesday - Just before her 15th Birthday. Princess Cleopatra is zapped thirty thousand years into the future where she discovers that she is the prophesied savior of the galaxy.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep27
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 1 - Prince Barty and Princess Julienne, King Julien's needy and dramatic parents, must take over for their son when he's held captive on a pirate ship

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Rupert’S Wild Scooter Ride - Rupert and his friends chase all over Nutwood when Ping Pong's spell accidentaly makes his scooter run away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rupert And The Undersea Adventure - Undersea adventures when Rupert, Bill and Ping Pong have to rescue Miranda the Mermaid from the clutches of a Giant Clam.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep1
programme.desc: A Time To Be Quiet. A Time To Be Loud - Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble'S Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew / Pups Save an Ostrich - Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better then the PAW Patrol. // The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. The PAW Patrol must find and lead it to the Wingnuts' ranch.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye / Pups Go for the Gold - When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch / Pups Save a Cat Burglar - Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken - Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep815
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Quest for the Dragon's Tooth - When Ryder and the pups are knighted by the Princess of Barkingburg, they're put to the test when a disgruntled ex-Knight gains control of a dragon and attacks the castle.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep818
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Dozing Dragon - When the Duke and Claw use a magic cauldron to put the people of Barkingburg to sleep, their plan backfires when the enchanted fog works on Sparks, it's up to the Paw Patrol to wake up the Dragon along with everyone else in town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep819
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Tournament / Rescue Knights: Pups Save the Baby Dragons - The Paw Patrol helps a Mystery Knight, the Princess in disguise, win a tournament when Claw and Sparks show up and sabotage the event. // The Rescue Knights must save some baby dragons from Claw and reunite them with their mommy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep820
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Break the Ice / Rescue Knight: Pups Save Excalibark - Claw finds a way to make Sparks' breath icy and sets out to freeze all of Barkingburg. // When Chase accidentally pulls the legendary Golden Bone of Excalibark from its stone and becomes the Royal Knight, the Duke and Claw plot to ruin the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep821
programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! / Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise / Pups Save a Tower of Pizza - Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas! // Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep603

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save the Squirrels / Pups Save a Roo - The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard! // It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!
